description: Luxurious black silk robe with wide kimono sleeves

core:name.text: black silk robe with kimono sleeves

core:description.text: An elegant fusion of Eastern and gothic aesthetics, this flowing robe features wide kimono-style sleeves that drape gracefully with movement. Crafted from lustrous black silk adorned with subtle gold thread embroidery forming elegant patterns, the robe wraps closed with a tie belt at the waist. The luxurious drape and soft texture create comfort without sacrificing visual drama. This piece transitions seamlessly from intimate loungewear to statement layering piece, bringing Asian-inspired elegance to gothic wardrobes.
